pullRequest.title: Stop setting OMR_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS
pullRequest.bodyText:
This option was deprecated, and is no longer used in the autoconf
builds. Remove the flag J9VM_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS as it appears to
be entirely unused, and only exists in the cmake build system.
cc @gacholio @dnakamura

beforeCommit.message:
Stop setting OMR_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS

This option was deprecated, and is no longer used in the autoconf
builds.  Remove the flag `J9VM_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS` as it appears to
be entirely unused, and only exists in the cmake build system.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Young <youngar17@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
Stop setting OMR_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS

This option was deprecated, and is no longer used in the autoconf
builds.  Remove the flag `J9VM_GC_COMPRESSED_POINTERS` as it appears to
be entirely unused, and only exists in the cmake build system.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Young <youngar17@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: I don't expect a build to succeed with this change: gc_compressedPointers is still used at  https://github.com/eclipse/openj9/blob/master/debugtools/DDR_VM/src/com/ibm/j9ddr/vm29/pointer/helper/J9ObjectHelper.java#L70
